mapper.insert: insert into sck_zhfz(sckid,xmkid,scqdzh,sczdzh,sczlc,scyhlc,tzgs,spwh,fapgdw,fascdw,faspsj,jsxz,jsnr,scbz,scbmbm,sck_sbzt,sck_shzt,sck_lxbm,sck_lxmc,sck_sbthcd,lrjh,bzls) values(sys_guid(),#{xmkid},#{scqdzh},#{sczdzh},#{sczlc},#{scyhlc},#{tzgs},#{spwh},#{fapgdw},#{fascdw},#{faspsj},#{jsxz},#{jsnr},#{scbz}, #{scbmbm},'未上报','未审核',#{lxbm},#{lxmc},#{sck_sbthcd},'未列入',#{bzls})
update sck_zhfz set lrjh='已列入' where sckid=#{String}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum num ,t.*,decode(sck_sbthcd,#{sck_sbthcd},'未上报',sck_sbzt) sck_sbzt2 from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) t where sck_sbthcd <=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sck_sbthcd,#{sck_sbthcd},'未上报',sck_sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and bzls like #{bzls}||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by sck_sbzt2

select count(*) from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) where sck_sbthcd <=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sck_sbthcd,#{sck_sbthcd},'未上报',sck_sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and bzls like #{bzls}||'%'
select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id where sckid=#{sckid}
mapper.update: update sck_zhfz set sck_sbzt='已上报', sck_sbsj=sysdate,sck_sbbm=#{sck_sbbm}, sck_sbthcd=#{sck_sbthcd} where sckid =#{sckid}
update sck_zhfz set sck_shzt='已审核',sck_shsj=sysdate,sck_shbm=#{sck_shbm} where sckid=#{sckid}
update sck_zhfz set sck_sbthcd=(sck_sbthcd+2) where sckid =#{String}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum num ,t.* from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) t where sck_sbzt='已上报' and sck_sbthcd=7 and sck_sbthcd>=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and bzls like #{bzls}||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by sck_shzt desc

select count(*) from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) where sck_sbzt='已上报' and sck_sbthcd=7 and sck_sbthcd>=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and bzls like #{bzls}||'%'

select count(*) from sck_zhfz where lrjh='未列入'
and sck_lxbm=#{lxbm}
and to_number(sczdzh)>=to_number(#{qdzh})
and to_number(scqdzh) <=to_number(#{zdzh})

select count(*) from sck_zhfz where lrjh='已列入'
and sck_lxbm=#{lxbm}
and to_number(sczdzh)>=to_number(#{qdzh})
and to_number(scqdzh) <=to_number(#{zdzh})

select sbzt v_0,gydw v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qdzh v_5,zdzh v_6,qzlc v_7,qzlc v_8,yhlc v_9,gjxjnd v_10,xmnf v_11,jsxz v_12 from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id where 1=1 and sck_sbthcd <=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm like substr(#{gydw},1,instr(#{gydw},'00')-1) || '%'
and xzqhdm like substr(#{xzqhmc},1,instr(#{xzqhmc},'00')-1) || '%'
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'

select sbzt v_0,gydw v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qdzh v_5,zdzh v_6,qzlc v_7,qzlc v_8,yhlc v_9,gjxjnd v_10,xmnf v_11,jsxz v_12 from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id where 1=1 and sck_sbzt='已上报' and sck_sbthcd <=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm like substr(#{gydw},1,instr(#{gydw},'00')-1) || '%'
and xzqhdm like substr(#{xzqhmc},1,instr(#{xzqhmc},'00')-1) || '%'
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'

select gydw v_0,xzqhdm v_0,xzqhmc v_1,lxbm v_2,lxmc v_3,qdzh v_4,zdzh v_5,qzlc v_6,yhlc v_7,gjxjnd v_8 from xmk_zhfz where 1=1 and sbzt='已上报' and id not in (select xmkid from sck_zhfz) and sbthcd <=#{sck_sbthcd}
and tbbmbm like #{tbdw}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into sck_zhfz(sckid,xmkid, sck_lxbm,sck_lxmc,scqdzh,sczdzh,sczlc,scyhlc,fapgdw,fascdw,faspsj,spwh,tzgs,jsxz,jsnr,scbz,sck_sbzt,sck_shzt,scbmbm,sck_sbthcd,lrjh,bzls) values(sys_guid(),(select ID from XMK_Zhfz where lxbm=trim(#{2}) and lxmc=trim(#{3})), #{2},#{3},#{9},#{10},to_number(#{10})-to_number(#{9}),#{11},#{12},#{13},#{14},#{15},#{16},#{17},#{18},#{19},'未上报','未审核',#{scbmbm},#{sck_sbthcd},'未列入','无')
mapper.select:
select count(*) sck_sbthcd,sum(sczlc) sczlc,sum(scyhlc) scyhlc from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) where sck_sbthcd <=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sck_sbthcd,#{sck_sbthcd},'未上报',sck_sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and bzls like #{bzls}||'%'

select count(*) sck_sbthcd,sum(sczlc) sczlc,sum(scyhlc) scyhlc from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) where sck_sbzt='已上报' and sck_sbthcd=7 and sck_sbthcd>=#{sck_sbthcd}
and scbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and sck_lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and sck_lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and bzls like #{bzls}||'%'
